config-option.enable-prismatic.name: Enable Prismatic
config-option.enable-prismatic.descripti: Add prismatic coloring to garbage cans when they are holding special items.
config-option.excluded-garbage.name: Excluded Garbage
config-option.excluded-garbage.descripti: Exclude garbage can ids from their garbage can being replaced.
config-option.garbage-days.name: Garbage Day
config-option.garbage-days.description: The day of the week that garbage is collected.
config-option.skip-festival.name: Skip Festival
config-option.skip-festival.description: Skip pickups on festival days (will be collected on the next day).
